quest.name: That We Might Live
journal: Alphinaud is determined to offer the villagers what succor he can.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: His wounds are deep, but he may yet be saved. I will see to him─pray look after the others!

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: When I last came here to sell my fish, everyone was so bright and cheerful. This is a nightmare...

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: The horror... I pray that the Sisters will see us through this calamity...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: There is nothing you can do for this villager.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This villager has been dead for some time.

dialogue.name: PALAKASMANC04412
dialogue.text: I...I am fine, thank you... Please...save the others...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This poor soul is beyond saving.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I can tend to the rest. Pray look after Matsya─no doubt what we have seen here weighs even heavier on his heart than ours.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Stay by Matsya's side, Forename. Unlike us, he is not accustomed to seeing such horrors...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Oh, Forename! Forename!

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: This is Yeruvvet, the elder here. He is hurt, but─praise be to the Sisters─he still lives!

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: Young Matsya here has told me everything. I have not the words to express my gratitude for your aid.

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: When the heavens began to burn, we were afraid, but did our best to carry on as we always have done...

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: Until today, when those unholy beasts came pouring into our village, a flood of midnight and death...

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: There are no words to describe what followed. Men and women I have known since they were babes struck down by the creatures, only to rise again to join the murderous horde, in the guise of those same hideous fiends...

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: In the chaos, a handful of our villagers fled for their lives. I can only hope they have found their way to safety...

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: Matsya, do you perchance remember Qerasaf and Mehvan? The young couple who always bought your freshest catches...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: How could I forget, Elder? When I first came to peddle my wares─desperate to eke out a living─they showed me such kindness...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Others shunned me as an outsider, as is their way. But Qerasaf and Mehvan bought my fish, and sung its praises. They turned my fortunes around!

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: Alas, I fear they are in terrible danger. I saw them running towards Agama Temple, one of those beasts in close pursuit.

dialogue.name: YERUVVET
dialogue.text: They had their child─still but a tiny babe. To elude these fiends while caring for one so young is an impossible task, surely. I beg of you, go to their aid...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: I...I want to help them. Yet I am but a fisherman─I cannot face beasts on my own. Will you come with me?

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you! Agama Temple lies to the west of here. We must hurry!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Don't worry─Alphinaud and I will watch over the village until you return. Go and find Matsya's friends.

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: The temple is just ahead...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: It was built by those who worship Saint Agama, but has sadly fallen into disrepair in recent years.

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: If my friends made it this far, no doubt they are hiding somewhere amidst the ruins.

dialogue.name: QERASAF
dialogue.text: (-???-)No, please! Stay ba─annngggh...gggaaah!

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: That was Qerasaf! Oh, no─this is not good!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I'll take a look.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Wait here.

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: P-Please do! The cry came from the ruins. You must hurry!

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Y-Yes, I understand... The cry came from the ruins! You must hurry!

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: That was Qerasaf's voice─I'm sure of it! Oh gods...gods have mercy...

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Aieeeeeeeeeghhh!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Why...why...aaaaaaghhh...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The man lies motionless on the ground, bearing a grievous wound...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: I'm sorry, Forename. I tried to stay behind, but I couldn't...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: No...it cannot be!

dialogue.name: QERASAF
dialogue.text: Is someone... Anyone...

dialogue.name: QERASAF
dialogue.text: My arms...so heavy... And my legs... I cannot feel my legs...

dialogue.name: QERASAF
dialogue.text: My wife...fled with our daughter...

dialogue.name: QERASAF
dialogue.text: I need to find them...need to be with them...

dialogue.name: QERASAF
dialogue.text: I need...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Qerasaf! No, Qerasaf─you must stay strong!

dialogue.name: QERASAF
dialogue.text: More time... I thought I had...

dialogue.name: QERASAF
dialogue.text: I...I don't want to die...

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Speak to Qerasaf.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Dry Qerasaf's tears.

dialogue.name: QERASAF
dialogue.text: Thank you...

dialogue.name: QERASAF
dialogue.text: Please...find them...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Mehvan still lives. And she has their child...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: We must search the jungle between here and Palaka's Stand. There is nowhere else she could have gone. I think...

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Forgive me, Qerasaf... Once we have saved your wife and child, we will return and lay you to rest...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You see no tracks or other signs of recent travel. Mehvan and the child must be elsewhere...

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Aaaaaaaaaaaaghhh!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Urk... Urggggggggghhh...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If Mehvan and her daughter came through this area recently, you see no evidence of their passage...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...There. Your wounds have closed. Can you stand?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Just a moment, Forename. I'll be with you shortly.

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: D-Did you see any sign of them? I found nothing!

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Perhaps the beasts have chased them farther from the village.

dialogue.name: MATSYA
dialogue.text: Oh, gods above, I beseech you! Pray deliver Mehvan and her little one to safety...
